body: @FantasyHN properly got drunk somewhere and forgot about it.

@BladeUnder The next chapter may probably go on the father's perspective so we'll see what he actually thought before and after this event. The author said there won't be any dark development so mayyybe the father will be fine with his son fucking his wife and Netorase'd her (= give her) to his son? Or we'll probably see a happy family threesome!!! lol

As you may report progress on twitter, please visit once in a while.  Well then.  Happy May 31, 2019 2/2 NOT SO SURE WHAT HE MEANT BY 'father still has a turn',. This is hentai so prolly sex AND IM NOT LIKING IT
Ah yeah almost forgot. [Reminder: NTR (= NeToRare, NeToRi, NeToRase, etc), NeToRi = MC steal the girl from another guy]

Afterword I am sorry.  This time I will be my 5th coterie work, "Mother's gotta be !! It is no good !! 5-final part · first part ~" Thank you very much for purchasing!  Well, regarding the content ....  I have done it.  I have done taboo's father barre expansion with mother and child thing.  I do not know why I did it.  I think I was riding really well.  Excuse me.  So, the evaluation of this work is a pros and cons ....  I'm scared to hear everyone's comments, but ... please do not hesitate to give me one.  It is one more work.  By the way, my father still has a turn, and it is not going to be a dark development at all, so it would be nice if those who didn't like the work now would be able to associate until the end.  I would like to put it out by the end of the year ... anyway, it will be next year because my hands are slow.  I hope you'll be patient.  It's about every time, but I'm burning up this time, so I would like to take a rest for a while and start drawing on it.  1/2
Dang now I'm dying to see what happens next.
